test.name: MCCs shall filter alert data (including NOCRs) associated with test protocol beacon messages (including SGB messages with bit 43 =1 in the 154-bit main field and FGB ELT(DT) messages with bits 43 – 66 = all “1”s or all “0”s). Prerequisite: the CMCC be configured in the DMCC as FGB ELT(DT) capable. The USMCC is so configured.
test.description: Send a SIT 145 message to the DMCC for a Canadian coded ELT(DT) Location Test protocol with bits 43 – 66 = all “1”s, and DOA position in Canada. Expected result: the DMCC does not send a SIT 145 message to the CMCC nor a message for the LADR
